headline: Is Verizon Stock a Buy Now?
summary: If you have ever struggled with a dropped phone call, you might understand the frustration Verizon Communications (NYSE: VZ) has been for its shareholders.  Despite the telecom giant being on track to end 2024 with a positive return, shares have deeply underperformed stock market benchmarks in recent years, losing about 15% of their value in the past five years compared to an 84% gain in the S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC) over the same period.  Is it time to dial in and buy Verizon stock now?
